025package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.bus;
026
027import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.key.Key;
028import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener.Listener;
029import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.priority.Priority;
030import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
031
032import java.util.Objects;
033
034/**
035 * A record that represents subscribed {@link Listener}.
036 *
037 * @param <E>        the event type
038 * @param eventClass tye event {@link Class}
039 * @param key        the key of that {@link Listener}
040 * @param listener   the {@link Listener} instance
041 * @param priority   the priority of that {@link Listener}
042 */
043public record SubscribedListener<E>(@NotNull Class<E> eventClass, @NotNull Key key,
044                                    @NotNull Listener<E> listener, @NotNull Priority priority) {
045
046    /**
047     * Creates a new {@link SubscribedListener}.
048     *
049     * @param eventClass tye event {@link Class}
050     * @param key        the key of that {@link Listener}
051     * @param listener   the {@link Listener} instance
052     * @param priority   the priority of that {@link Listener}
053     */
054    public SubscribedListener(@NotNull Class<E> eventClass, @NotNull Key key,
055                              @NotNull Listener<E> listener, @NotNull Priority priority) {
056        this.eventClass = Objects.requireNonNull(eventClass);
057        this.key = Objects.requireNonNull(key);
058        this.listener = Objects.requireNonNull(listener);
059        this.priority = Objects.requireNonNull(priority);
060    }
061}
